title: Swamp Critter Roster
content:
[[module css]]
sup {

vertical-align: top; position: relative; top: -0.5em;
}
@media (max-width: 1635px) {
   .desktop-only{ display: none; visibility:hidden }
}
.CS-title {
    font-family: 'alpha_echoregular';
}
#page-content .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-link {
    font-size: 2em;
}
[[/module]]

+ Meet the Swamp Critters!


The Swamp Critters are a group of individuals (staff, veteran authors, longtime experienced reviewers) dedicated to leaving helpful critique on final works posted to the main site. Their goal is to cultivate and curate an environment of constructive criticism on the wiki.

Though we all are experts on the basics for what makes a successful site author, we each have our own specializations and skillsets regarding the different kinds of writing you see on the wiki. Using this page, you will hopefully be able to contact a critter who is best suited for your particular style.


+ GUIDELINES FOR CONTACTING US

* ##blue|//Please include a link to your article.//##

* Please make sure to read through our individual profiles to find the best critter for you.

* If someone doesn't reply promptly, please don't spam their inbox asking why they haven't replied. A lot of us have busy schedules off the site, so if you've been waiting more than a few days for a response, feel free to reach out to another critter.

* Remember, all pages posted to the main site must be complete and final work. Don't ask us to review a draft!

* Site Crit members may decline to review material when the basics[[footnote]]Generally correct grammar, mechanics, formatting[[/footnote]] are not met, or for other reasons (such as not being interested in the article or having real-life commitments/time constraints).

* Please be polite! (We're unpaid volunteers here.)

-----

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
[[*user cybersqyd]]  ~  **Callsign:** Caribbean Reef Squid
@@ @@
[[image sqyd.jpg style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Moderator:** Forum Crit
**Chat Nick:** cybersqyd ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** Wikidot PM  ~ **Response Time:** ##green|Fast##
**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs mostly; open to GoI-formats##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|Poetry##
**Strengths:** Concepts, weird things, SCPs.
**Likes:** Short/Medium length SCPs; stuff that's fun, kinda weird or a bit horror-esque

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
[[*user Cyvstvi13]]  ~  **Callsign:** Cheetah[[footnote]]I evidently have no idea where cheetahs live.[[/footnote]]
@@ @@
[[image cyv.jpg style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Critique Specialist**
**Chat Nick:** Cyvstvi ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** IRC ~ **Response Time:** ##green|Fast##
**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Tales, GoI Formats##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|-J's, humorous articles##
**Strengths:** Tone, narrative, "Foundation lore", grammar, history, short articles (500 words).
**Likes:** History-themed articles, existing lore and GoIs, Lovecraftian horror, general horror, religious themes, articles with an unclear/mysterious narrative.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
[[*user DrAkimoto]]  ~  **Callsign:** Otter
@@ @@
[[image aki.jpg style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Operational Staff:** Site Crit, IO, CO: Seminars
**Chat Nick:**  DrAkimoto ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:**  IRC Chat ~ **Response Time:** ##green|Fast##
**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, -J's, GoI Formats##
**Strengths:** Dialogue, Con-Procs, Narrative development, humor, world-building, clinical tone, brevity, absurd horror
**Likes:** Short articles (<2000 words), anything to do with animals, religious, political, commercial, SPC, fridge horror, comedy, good things that do things.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]

@@ @@
[[image gee.jpg style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Moderator:** Site Crit, Forum Crit
**Chat Nick:** Gee0765  ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** Any  ~ **Response Time:** ##green|Fast##
**Will Crit:** ##green|Basically anything##
**Strengths:** Concepts, clinical tone, looking at the piece as a whole.
**Likes:** Humour, short or medium-length pieces, animals, unusual concepts, body horror.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Tales, GoI Formats##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|-J, Humor in general, unfinished drafts.##

**Administrator:** Site Crit

**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Joke articles, Stand-Alone Tales##

**Strengths:** Dialogue, Clinical Tone, Direct Ideas

**Junior Staff:** Site Crit
**Chat Nick:** Mew-ltiverse, Mew-ltwoverse ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** IRC ~ **Response Time:** ##green|Fast##
**Will Crit:** ##green|Most SCPs, tales##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|Most GOI formats (AWCY is an exception); do ask first, Js or anything humorous, Anything over 2500 words##
**Strengths:** Internet SCPs, psychology, AWCY, character building, concepts, narrative building
**Likes:** Internet based stuff, insects, media, psychology, AWCY, personnel focused things
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]

[[*user MrAnakinSpecter]]  ~  **Callsign:** Weasel
@@ @@
[[image ani.JPG style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Operational Staff:** Site Crit, Chat
**Chat Nick:** MrAnakinSpecter ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** Chat or Wikidot PM ~ **Response Time:** ##FF8C00|Medium, most likely##
**Will Crit:** ##green|Whatever you can throw at me.##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|Anything dealing with metaphysical concepts â€” that stuff always goes right over my head.##
**Strengths:** Grammar, conceptual details, and wording.
**Likes:** Ghosts, phantoms, specters, mysterious apparitions, visitors from beyond the grave, and the material culture of humans.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]

[[*user Riemann]]  ~  **Callsign:** //Ostrich fern//
@@ @@
[[image http://www.scp-wiki.net/local--files/malycegraves-author/riemann.jpg style="width:20%;"]]
-----
**Scientist:** Site Crit, Licensing
**Chat Nick:** Riemann  ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** IRC ~ **Response Time:** ##Orange|Medium##
**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Tales##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|Lengthy articles, multi-paged articles, parts of a larger series##
**Strengths:** Clinical tone, prose, physics, narrative, structural purpose
**Likes:** Short articles, articles with interesting containment procedures, articles without collapsibles, taking his list of likes from ARD
[[/=]]
[[/div]] 

@@ @@

@@ @@

-----
**Moderator:** Site Criticism Vice Captain
**Chat Nick:** RockTeethMothEyes  ~ ##green|Accepts Crit Requests##
**Preferred Contact:** Wikidot PM ~ **Response Time:** ##FF8C00|Medium## (2-3 days)
**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Tales, GoI Formats##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|Poetry, Essays##
**Strengths:** Condensing, Short-form, English grammar
**Likes:** Short and sweet, distressing, dark humor, sad endings, happy endings, Wondertainment, MC&D

[[/=]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

-----
**Moderator:** Site Crit, Forum Crit, CO: Seminars

**Will Crit:** ##green|SCPs, Tales, GoI Formats##
**Will Not Crit:** ##firebrick|SCPs and GoI Formats longer than 3000 words##

author: RockTeethMothEyes
